bit_field.name: DISMCYCINT
bit_field.description: Disables interruption of multi-cycle instructions.

bit_field.name: DISDEFWBUF
bit_field.description: Disables write buffer use during default memory map accesses.

bit_field.name: DISFOLD
bit_field.description: Disables folding of IT instructions.

bit_field.name: REVISION
bit_field.description: Indicates patch release: 0x0 = Patch 0

bit_field.name: PARTNO
bit_field.description: Indicates part number

bit_field.name: VARIANT
bit_field.description: Indicates processor revision: 0x2 = Revision 2

bit_field.name: IMPLEMENTER
bit_field.description: Implementer code

bit_field.name: VECTACTIVE
bit_field.description: Active exception number

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_RETTOBASE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: there are preempted active exceptions to execute

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_RETTOBASE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: there are no active exceptions, or the currently-executing exception is the only active exception

bit_field.name: VECTPENDING
bit_field.description: Exception number of the highest priority pending enabled exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_ISRPREEMPT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Will not service

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_ISRPREEMPT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Will service a pending exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_PENDSTCLR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no effect

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_PENDSTCLR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: removes the pending state from the SysTick exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_PENDSTSET_0b0
bit_field_value.description: write: no effect; read: SysTick exception is not pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_PENDSTSET_0b1
bit_field_value.description: write: changes SysTick exception state to pending; read: SysTick exception is pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_PENDSVCLR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no effect

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_PENDSVCLR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: removes the pending state from the PendSV exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_PENDSVSET_0b0
bit_field_value.description: write: no effect; read: PendSV exception is not pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_PENDSVSET_0b1
bit_field_value.description: write: changes PendSV exception state to pending; read: PendSV exception is pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_NMIPENDSET_0b0
bit_field_value.description: write: no effect; read: NMI exception is not pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_ICSR_NMIPENDSET_0b1
bit_field_value.description: write: changes NMI exception state to pending; read: NMI exception is pending

bit_field.name: TBLOFF
bit_field.description: Vector table base offset

register.name: SCB_AIRCR
register.description: Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register

bit_field_value.name: SCB_AIRCR_SYSRESETREQ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no system reset request

bit_field_value.name: SCB_AIRCR_SYSRESETREQ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: asserts a signal to the outer system that requests a reset

bit_field.name: PRIGROUP
bit_field.description: Interrupt priority grouping field. This field determines the split of group priority from subpriority.

bit_field.name: VECTKEY
bit_field.description: Register key

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SCR_SLEEPONEXIT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: o not sleep when returning to Thread mode

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SCR_SLEEPONEXIT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: enter sleep, or deep sleep, on return from an ISR

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SCR_SLEEPDEEP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: deep sleep

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SCR_SEVONPEND_0b0
bit_field_value.description: only enabled interrupts or events can wakeup the processor, disabled interrupts are excluded

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SCR_SEVONPEND_0b1
bit_field_value.description: enabled events and all interrupts, including disabled interrupts, can wakeup the processor

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_NONBASETHRDENA_0b0
bit_field_value.description: processor can enter Thread mode only when no exception is active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_NONBASETHRDENA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: processor can enter Thread mode from any level under the control of an EXC_RETURN value

bit_field.name: USERSETMPEND
bit_field.description: Enables unprivileged software access to the STIR

bit_field.name: UNALIGN_TRP
bit_field.description: Enables unaligned access traps

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_UNALIGN_TRP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: do not trap unaligned halfword and word accesses

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_UNALIGN_TRP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: trap unaligned halfword and word accesses

bit_field.name: DIV_0_TRP
bit_field.description: Enables faulting or halting when the processor executes an SDIV or UDIV instruction with a divisor of 0

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_DIV_0_TRP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: do not trap divide by 0

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_DIV_0_TRP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: trap divide by 0

bit_field.name: BFHFNMIGN
bit_field.description: Enables handlers with priority -1 or -2 to ignore data BusFaults caused by load and store instructions.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_BFHFNMIGN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: data bus faults caused by load and store instructions cause a lock-up

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_BFHFNMIGN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: handlers running at priority -1 and -2 ignore data bus faults caused by load and store instructions

bit_field.name: STKALIGN
bit_field.description: Indicates stack alignment on exception entry

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_STKALIGN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: 4-byte aligned

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CCR_STKALIGN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: 8-byte aligned

bit_field.name: PRI_4
bit_field.description: Priority of system handler 4, MemManage

bit_field.name: PRI_5
bit_field.description: Priority of system handler 5, BusFault

bit_field.name: PRI_6
bit_field.description: Priority of system handler 6, UsageFault

bit_field.name: PRI_11
bit_field.description: Priority of system handler 11, SVCall

bit_field.name: PRI_14
bit_field.description: Priority of system handler 14, PendSV

bit_field.name: PRI_15
bit_field.description: Priority of system handler 15, SysTick exception

register.name: SCB_SHCSR
register.description: System Handler Control and State Register

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_MEMFAULTACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_MEMFAULTACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_BUSFAULTACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_BUSFAULTACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_USGFAULTACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_USGFAULTACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_SVCALLACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_SVCALLACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_MONITORACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_MONITORACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_PENDSVACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_PENDSVACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_SYSTICKACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_SYSTICKACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_USGFAULTPENDED_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_USGFAULTPENDED_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_MEMFAULTPENDED_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_MEMFAULTPENDED_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_BUSFAULTPENDED_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_BUSFAULTPENDED_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_SVCALLPENDED_0b0
bit_field_value.description: exception is not pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_SVCALLPENDED_0b1
bit_field_value.description: exception is pending

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_MEMFAULTENA_0b0
bit_field_value.description: disable the exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_MEMFAULTENA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: enable the exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_BUSFAULTENA_0b0
bit_field_value.description: disable the exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_BUSFAULTENA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: enable the exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_USGFAULTENA_0b0
bit_field_value.description: disable the exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_SHCSR_USGFAULTENA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: enable the exception

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_IACCVIOL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no instruction access violation fault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_IACCVIOL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: the processor attempted an instruction fetch from a location that does not permit execution

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_DACCVIOL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no data access violation fault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_DACCVIOL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: the processor attempted a load or store at a location that does not permit the operation

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_MUNSTKERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no unstacking fault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_MUNSTKERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: unstack for an exception return has caused one or more access violations

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_MSTKERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no stacking fault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_MSTKERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: stacking for an exception entry has caused one or more access violations

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_MLSPERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No MemManage fault occurred during floating-point lazy state preservation

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_MLSPERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A MemManage fault occurred during floating-point lazy state preservation

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_MMARVALID_0b0
bit_field_value.description: value in MMAR is not a valid fault address

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_MMARVALID_0b1
bit_field_value.description: MMAR holds a valid fault address

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_IBUSERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no instruction bus error

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_IBUSERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: instruction bus error

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_PRECISERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no precise data bus error

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_PRECISERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: a data bus error has occurred, and the PC value stacked for the exception return points to the instruction that caused the fault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_IMPRECISERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no imprecise data bus error

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_IMPRECISERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: a data bus error has occurred, but the return address in the stack frame is not related to the instruction that caused the error

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_UNSTKERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no unstacking fault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_UNSTKERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: unstack for an exception return has caused one or more BusFaults

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_STKERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no stacking fault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_STKERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: stacking for an exception entry has caused one or more BusFaults

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_LSPERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No bus fault occurred during floating-point lazy state preservation

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_LSPERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A bus fault occurred during floating-point lazy state preservation

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_BFARVALID_0b0
bit_field_value.description: value in BFAR is not a valid fault address

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_BFARVALID_0b1
bit_field_value.description: BFAR holds a valid fault address

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_UNDEFINSTR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no undefined instruction UsageFault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_UNDEFINSTR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: the processor has attempted to execute an undefined instruction

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_INVSTATE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no invalid state UsageFault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_INVSTATE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: the processor has attempted to execute an instruction that makes illegal use of the EPSR

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_INVPC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no invalid PC load UsageFault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_INVPC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: the processor has attempted an illegal load of EXC_RETURN to the PC

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_NOCP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no UsageFault caused by attempting to access a coprocessor

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_NOCP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: the processor has attempted to access a coprocessor

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_UNALIGNED_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no unaligned access fault, or unaligned access trapping not enabled

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_UNALIGNED_0b1
bit_field_value.description: the processor has made an unaligned memory access

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_DIVBYZERO_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no divide by zero fault, or divide by zero trapping not enabled

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CFSR_DIVBYZERO_0b1
bit_field_value.description: the processor has executed an SDIV or UDIV instruction with a divisor of 0

bit_field_value.name: SCB_HFSR_VECTTBL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no BusFault on vector table read

bit_field_value.name: SCB_HFSR_VECTTBL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: BusFault on vector table read

bit_field_value.name: SCB_HFSR_FORCED_0b0
bit_field_value.description: no forced HardFault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_HFSR_FORCED_0b1
bit_field_value.description: forced HardFault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_HALTED_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No active halt request debug event

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_HALTED_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Halt request debug event active

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_BKPT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No current breakpoint debug event

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_BKPT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: At least one current breakpoint debug event

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_DWTTRAP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No current debug events generated by the DWT

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_DWTTRAP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: At least one current debug event generated by the DWT

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_VCATCH_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No Vector catch triggered

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_VCATCH_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Vector catch triggered

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_EXTERNAL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No EDBGRQ debug event

bit_field_value.name: SCB_DFSR_EXTERNAL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: EDBGRQ debug event

bit_field.name: ADDRESS
bit_field.description: Address of MemManage fault location

bit_field.name: ADDRESS
bit_field.description: Address of the BusFault location

bit_field.name: AUXFAULT
bit_field.description: Latched version of the AUXFAULT inputs

bit_field.name: CP10
bit_field.description: Access privileges for coprocessor 10.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CPACR_CP10_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Access denied. Any attempted access generates a NOCP UsageFault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CPACR_CP10_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Privileged access only. An unprivileged access generates a NOCP fault.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CPACR_CP10_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Reserved. The result of any access is UNPREDICTABLE.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CPACR_CP10_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Full access.

bit_field.name: CP11
bit_field.description: Access privileges for coprocessor 11.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CPACR_CP11_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Access denied. Any attempted access generates a NOCP UsageFault

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CPACR_CP11_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Privileged access only. An unprivileged access generates a NOCP fault.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CPACR_CP11_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Reserved. The result of any access is UNPREDICTABLE.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_CPACR_CP11_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Full access.

bit_field.name: LSPACT
bit_field.description: Lazy state preservation.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_LSPACT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Lazy state preservation is not active.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_LSPACT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Lazy state preservation is active. floating-point stack frame has been allocated but saving state to it has been deferred.

bit_field.name: USER
bit_field.description: Privilege level when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_USER_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Privilege level was not user when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_USER_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Privilege level was user when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field.name: THREAD
bit_field.description: Mode when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_THREAD_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Mode was not Thread Mode when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_THREAD_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Mode was Thread Mode when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field.name: HFRDY
bit_field.description: Permission to set the HardFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_HFRDY_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Priority did not permit setting the HardFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_HFRDY_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Priority permitted setting the HardFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field.name: MMRDY
bit_field.description: Permission to set the MemManage handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_MMRDY_0b0
bit_field_value.description: MemManage is disabled or priority did not permit setting the MemManage handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_MMRDY_0b1
bit_field_value.description: MemManage is enabled and priority permitted setting the MemManage handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field.name: BFRDY
bit_field.description: Permission to set the BusFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_BFRDY_0b0
bit_field_value.description: BusFault is disabled or priority did not permit setting the BusFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_BFRDY_0b1
bit_field_value.description: BusFault is disabled or priority did not permit setting the BusFault handler to the pending state when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field.name: MONRDY
bit_field.description: Permission to set the MON_PEND when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_MONRDY_0b0
bit_field_value.description: DebugMonitor is disabled or priority did not permit setting MON_PEND when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_MONRDY_0b1
bit_field_value.description: DebugMonitor is enabled and priority permits setting MON_PEND when the floating-point stack frame was allocated.

bit_field.name: LSPEN
bit_field.description: Lazy state preservation for floating-point context.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_LSPEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disable automatic lazy state preservation for floating-point context.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_LSPEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable automatic lazy state preservation for floating-point context.

bit_field.name: ASPEN
bit_field.description: Enables CONTROL2 setting on execution of a floating-point instruction. This results in automatic hardware state preservation and restoration, for floating-point context, on exception entry and exit.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_ASPEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disable CONTROL2 setting on execution of a floating-point instruction.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPCCR_ASPEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable CONTROL2 setting on execution of a floating-point instruction.

bit_field.name: ADDRESS
bit_field.description: The location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame.

bit_field.name: RMode
bit_field.description: Default value for FPSCR.RMode (Rounding Mode control field).

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_RMode_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Round to Nearest (RN) mode

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_RMode_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Round towards Plus Infinity (RP) mode.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_RMode_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Round towards Minus Infinity (RM) mode.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_RMode_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Round towards Zero (RZ) mode.

bit_field.name: FZ
bit_field.description: Default value for FPSCR.FZ (Flush-to-zero mode control bit).

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_FZ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Flush-to-zero mode disabled. Behavior of the floating-point system is fully compliant with the IEEE 754 standard.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_FZ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Flush-to-zero mode enabled.

bit_field.name: DN
bit_field.description: Default value for FPSCR.DN (Default NaN mode control bit).

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_DN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: NaN operands propagate through to the output of a floating-point operation.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_DN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Any operation involving one or more NaNs returns the Default NaN.

bit_field.name: AHP
bit_field.description: Default value for FPSCR.AHP (Alternative half-precision control bit).

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_AHP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: IEEE half-precision format selected.

bit_field_value.name: SCB_FPDSCR_AHP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Alternative half-precision format selected.
